mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('ORD', DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(ordr_no, 12) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 3, '0')) FROM orders WHERE ordr_no LIKE CONCAT('ORD', DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), '%')

SELECT CONCAT('ITEM', DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(ordr_dtl_artcl_no, 13) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 3, '0')) FROM order_items WHERE ordr_dtl_artcl_no LIKE CONCAT('ITEM', DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), '%')
SELECT CONCAT('pay_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(stlm_id, 5) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 5, '0')) FROM payments
SELECT CONCAT('pay_his_', LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(stlm_hstry_id, 9) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 5, '0')) FROM payments_history
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( ordr_no, user_no, ordr_dt, gds_tot_amt, dlvy_fee_amt, pblcn_cpn_id, user_cpn_id, apld_cpn_dscnt_amt, last_stlm_amt, ordr_stts_cd, rcvr_nm, rcvr_telno, dlvy_addr, dlvy_daddr, zip, dlvy_memo_cn, user_name ) VALUES ( #{ordrNo}, #{userNo}, #{ordrDt}, #{gdsTotAmt}, #{dlvyFeeAmt}, #{pblcnCpnId}, #{userCpnId}, #{apldCpnDscntAmt}, #{lastStlmAmt}, #{ordrSttsCd}, #{rcvrNm}, #{rcvrTelno}, #{dlvyAddr}, #{dlvyDaddr}, #{zip}, #{dlvyMemoCn}, #{userName} )

INSERT INTO order_items (ordr_dtl_artcl_no, ordr_no, opt_no, gds_no, store_id, ordr_qntty, ordr_tm_untprc, ordr_dtl_artcl_dcsn_cd) VALUES (#{ordrDtlArtclNo}, #{ordrNo}, #{optNo}, #{gdsNo}, #{storeId}, #{ordrQntty}, #{ordrTmUntprc}, #{ordrDtlArtclDcsnCd})
INSERT INTO payments_history (stlm_hstry_id, stlm_id, hstry_crt_dt) VALUES (#{stlmHstryId}, #{stlmId}, #{hstryCrtDt})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, (SELECT user_nm FROM users WHERE user_no = o.user_no) AS user_name FROM orders o WHERE ordr_no = #{ordrNo}
SELECT oi.gds_no, p.gds_nm, oi.ordr_qntty, oi.ordr_tm_untprc, oi.store_id FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.gds_no = p.gds_no WHERE oi.ordr_no = #{orderId}
SELECT ordr_no FROM orders WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY ordr_dt DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT o.ordr_no, o.ordr_dt, o.last_stlm_amt, o.ordr_stts_cd, p.stlm_mthd_cd, (SELECT gds_nm FROM products WHERE gds_no = (SELECT gds_no FROM order_items WHERE ordr_no = o.ordr_no LIMIT 1)) AS first_product_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_items WHERE ordr_no = o.ordr_no) AS total_products_count FROM orders o JOIN payments p ON o.ordr_no = p.ordr_no WHERE o.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY o.ordr_dt DESC

SELECT uc.user_cpn_id AS uc_user_cpn_id, uc.user_no AS uc_user_no, uc.use_yn AS uc_use_yn, uc.indiv_expry_dt AS uc_indiv_expry_dt, c.pblcn_cpn_id AS c_pblcn_cpn_id, c.cpn_nm AS c_cpn_nm, c.dscnt_vl AS c_dscnt_vl, c.min_ordr_amt AS c_min_ordr_amt, c.max_dscnt_amt AS c_max_dscnt_amt, c.vld_end_dt AS c_vld_end_dt, c.actvtn_yn AS c_actvtn_yn FROM user_coupons uc JOIN coupons c ON uc.pblcn_cpn_id = c.pblcn_cpn_id WHERE uc.user_no = #{userNo} AND uc.use_yn = 0 AND (uc.indiv_expry_dt IS NULL OR uc.indiv_expry_dt >= NOW()) AND c.actvtn_yn = 1 AND c.vld_end_dt >= NOW()
SELECT user_nm AS recipientName, telno AS phone, zip_cd AS postcode, addr AS address, daddr AS detailAddress FROM users WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT stlm_id FROM payments WHERE pg_dlng_id = #{paymentKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET ordr_stts_cd = #{ordrStatus} WHERE ordr_no = #{ordrNo}
UPDATE payments SET stlm_stts_cd = #{stlmSttsCd}, pg_dlng_id = #{pgDlngId}, stlm_cmptn_dt = NOW() WHERE ordr_no = #{ordrNo}
UPDATE user_coupons SET use_yn = 1, use_dt = NOW() WHERE user_cpn_id = #{userCpnId}
UPDATE users SET user_nm = #{recipientName}, telno = #{phone}, zip = #{postcode}, addr = #{address}, daddr = #{detailAddress}, mdfcn_dt = NOW() WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
